sections.text:
17-230.Street improvement program; tax levy limitation.

Any levy pursuant to section 17-229 shall not be considered within the limitation on the village for the levy of taxes as contained in section 17-702.

SourceLaws 1963, c. 85, ยง 2, p. 293;Laws 1965, c. 69, ยง 2, p. 290;Laws 1979, LB 187, ยง 47;Laws 2017, LB133, ยง 93.
